Uzavřená konstrukce sluchátek do uší umožňuje soukromý poslech bez rušivého úniku zvuku do okolí. Sluchátka jsou navržena pro pohodlné a pevné usazení v uších – ideální pro nošení doma, v práci nebo na cestách. Připojení probíhá prostřednictvím technologie Bluetooth. Integrovaná baterie poskytuje výdrž až 25 hodin provozu a stupeň krytí IPX4 zajišťuje ochranu proti stříkající vodě. items.raw_desc: Hibakód olvasó ANCEL AD310 OBD-II:The ANCEL AD310 is a universal OBD-II diagnostic scanner designed for quick checking of the technical condition of the vehicle, which will be appreciated by beginners and more experienced drivers. It is compatible with most cars supporting OBD-II and CAN protocols, which includes cars manufactured since 1996 in the USA and since 2000 in Europe and Asia. Allows you to read and delete error codes, monitor live data and perform key engine system tests. Thanks to its simple operation and clear display, it provides quick on-site diagnostics. The scanner is powered directly from the OBD-II port without the need for batteries, ensuring immediate readiness for use. Thanks to its small size and weight of just 340 grams, it is easy to carry and keep on hand in the car or workshop at all times. The ANCEL AD310 OBD-II supports a wide range of functions, including I/M emission readiness test and freeze frame data display.
